LoadFinanceData.Query: SELECT id, date, expense, category, amount FROM finance

LoadExpensesByCategoryData.Query: SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS totalAmount FROM finance GROUP BY category

LoadTotalExpensesData.Query: SELECT SUM(amount) AS totalExpenses FROM finance

AddExpenseData.Query: INSERT INTO finance (id, date, expense, category, amount) VALUES (@Id, @Date, @Expense, @Category, @Amount)

UpdateExpenseData.Query: UPDATE finance SET date = @Date, expense = @Expense, category = @Category, amount = @Amount WHERE id = @Id
